mapper.select: SELECT PREG_GOODS_NO /* prPregGoodsItemInfo.getPregGoodsItemList */ , GOODS_NOTI_LISART_CD , GOODS_NOTI_ITEM_CD , NOTI_ITEM_CMT , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_PREG_GOODS_ITEM_INFO WHERE PREG_GOODS_NO = #{pregGoodsNo} ORDER BY GOODS_NOTI_ITEM_CD
